column5: ONce upon a time I had one of these for the Kawarthas and the Ptbo area.  Any idea where I can get one now?  I lost mine somehow...  thanks
i just bought an ontario backroads atlas from chapters.  there are similar govt publications at fedpubs.com.  the kawarthas backroads fishing maps are sold out til fall.
at your local gas station  that's where I bought mine for the area I fish in.
I have seen them at Chapters. Kenny G.
they are at chapters. i went in there to read up on oxtongue lake,got the info i needed then left.
they are also at crappy tire and wallys world
Yeah, they were everywhere.  I found one at Chapters.  Really great because the kawarthas, barrie and algonquin are all in the same book.
I got mine in Costco for $8.
